name: Aged care services
description: Over the last 40 years Arcare have established themselves as the premium accredited provider of residential aged care for older Australians throughout Queensland, Victoria and New South Wales.

name: Sensitive (Dementia) Care
description: We are committed to nurturing the well-being and development of all people who live in our residential communities. We understand that some people living with dementia require extra support in order to experience well-being and continued growth.

name: Nursing and Support Services
description: There are fully qualified Registered Nurses and other clinical support team members in every Arcare residence – 24 hours a day, seven days a week, 365 days a year.

name: Permanent Residential Aged Care Living
description: People move into residential aged care because they need increased support to continue to live their lives – on their own terms.

name: Palliative Care
description: Relative care's specialised health and social care professionals provide consistent, intuitive and holistic palliative care and support for you and those closest to you.

name: Respite Care
description: Residential respite care is a great way for you to take a break and immerse yourself in one of Arcare’s stunning residential communities.

name: Host Home Program
description: The groups meet weekly, with activities designed to promote physical and emotional wellbeing while encouraging independence and active ageing.
